name.description: The name of the thing. Examples: 'Living room', 'Bookcase', 'Top shelf', 'Passport case', 'Passport'

container.description: The name of the other thing which contains this thing. Can be null if the thing isn't contained within any other thing. Examples: for 'Living room', null; for 'Bookcase', 'Living room'; for 'Top shelf', 'Bookcase'; for 'Passport case', 'Top shelf'; for 'Passport', 'Passport case'

can_contain_things.description: Whether or not the thing can contain other things. Examples: for 'Living room', true; for 'Bookcase', true; for 'Top shelf', true; for 'Passport case', true; for 'Passport', false

exclude_from_search.description: Whether or not the thing should appear in search results. Should be false for rooms and furniture (things that are unlikely to move and get lost). Examples: for 'Living room', true; for 'Bookcase', true; for 'Top shelf', true; for 'Passport case', false; for 'Passport', false
